1.content:
lets meet our players

the next chapter will be with the first bet


First, all the way from the Kanto Region Please Welcome, MISTY

Next, She fights hallows for a living and still manages to go to school lets welcome Rukia

Third is the newest partner for the Pokemon Pimp known as Ash, give it up for Dawn

Fourth is that Pink haired girl from the Hidden Leaf Village, Sakara

Last, is her Rival INO
1.title: Players

info.brief_description: like strip poker only think bigger
info.description:
A handy game of poker with Anime females where the winner gets double the pot,

when add a chapter place a bet
